ing: 1 (9 ounce) package BUITONIÂ® Refrigerated Spinach Cheese Tortellini, prepared according to package directions
1 (10 ounce) container BUITONIÂ® Refrigerated Alfredo Sauce
1/4 cup BUITONIÂ® Freshly Shredded Parmesan Cheese
n: Tortellini Alfredo with Peas and Bacon
des: "Spinach cheese tortellini, peas, and bacon combined with delicious Alfredo sauce make this recipe a perfect fit for a festive party or a casual get together."
ins:
Cook onion, mushrooms and bacon in medium saucepan over medium-high heat until bacon is crisp; drain. Add pasta, sauce, peas and pepper; cook, stirring occasionally, for 1 minute.
Serve with cheese.
